title: Peduto pledge unlocks $5M in funding for Pittsburgh
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Business News - Today 
Pittsburgh Mayor Bill Peduto is pledging at least 10 percent of the city's operating and capital budget for flood control, street and facili...
